meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Fell</kanji> trees in <kanji>interval</kanji>s, instead of all at once, and it's called <vocabulary>tree thinning</vocabulary>. That way there's still some forest there, but you get your wood to use for other things too.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
